participant_1.background:
I spent my last birthday with my grandchildren and we had a lot of fun.
i love 80s music.
I started writing and recording blues music in my spare time.
I keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden.
I like to read books and watch documentaries to expand my knowledge.

participant_2.background:
I am not very good at keeping up with my family, but I try my best.
i like to work on cars.
i sometimes think i am shallow.
i live on a beet farm.
The most valued material possession I have is my teddy bear from childhood

content.text: Hi, how are you doing?
Hello there! I'm doing okay.
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to work on cars and spend time with my family.
That's great! What's your favorite thing to do with your family?
We like to go camping and go to the beach.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read books and watch documentaries.
I love to read books too! I also like to watch documentaries.
What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different types of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries.
Those are great genres! I love mysteries too.
Me too! I also like to watch documentaries about history and mysteries.
I love history documentaries! Do you have any favorite documentaries?
I really enjoyed watching the documentary about the Titanic. I also liked watching the documentary about the Black Death.
Those are both great documentaries! I also enjoyed watching the documentary about the American Civil War.
That's a great documentary too! I love learning about history.
Me too! I think history is really important.
I agree! It's important to learn about the past so we can understand the present.
I think that's a great point.
Thanks!
